Title: A Humble Offering
Description:
I'm almost ready for the ritual, there's just one more thing we need: An offering.

Relax, I don't mean a sacrifice. Just a bit of food.

There are sure to be mushrooms growing in Tideview Thicket to the northwest that are suitable for this. Please bring some.
ObjectivesText: Gather 10 Tidemist Caps from Tideview Thicket.
RewardText:
Thank you, $p. These mushrooms may not seem like much of an offering, but the sentiment alone will be enough to draw the spirits to us.

Also, they make a pretty fine stir-fry.
